title: How To Run WebAssembly on Kubernetes
author: Matt Butcher
description: Wasm functions can scale from zero instances to hundreds of thousands of instances in the blink of an eye — and then back down to zero again just as fast.
cntitle: 如何在 Kubernetes 上运行 WebAssembly
cndescription: Wasm 函数可以在眨眼间从零个实例扩展到数十万个实例，然后同样快地缩减回零。
